thread.title: Citigroup Sees Trading Revenue Falling 5% in Third Quarter
thread.title_full: Citigroup Sees Trading Revenue Falling 5% in Third Quarter - WSJ

author: Christina Rexrode
title: Citigroup Sees Trading Revenue Falling 5% in Third Quarter
text:
Citigroup Inc. expects its trading revenue could fall 5% in the third quarter, Chief Financial Officer John Gerspach said Wednesday.
Mr. Gerspach, speaking at the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference, said the year-over-year decline was partly the result of a strong performance in rates and currencies products in September 2014.
